title: Risotto alla Milanese
description: This creamy risotto is flavored with saffron, giving it a golden color and subtle floral aroma.
fun_fact: Risotto alla Milanese dates back to the 16th century in Milan, where saffron was widely used in art and cooking.
instructions: Heat broth and add saffron to infuse.
Sauté onion in olive oil until soft.
Add rice and toast for 1–2 minutes.
Cook until creamy and al dente (~18 minutes).
Stir in butter and Parmesan; rest 2 minutes before serving.
